synonyms.synonym: Nuclear receptor subfamily 1 group C member 3

protein.specific_function: Receptor that binds peroxisome proliferators such as hypolipidemic drugs and fatty acids. Once activated by a ligand, the receptor binds to a promoter element in the gene for acyl-CoA oxidase and activates its transcription. It therefore controls the peroxisomal beta-oxidation pathway of fatty acids. Key regulator of adipocyte differentiation and glucose homeostasis

go_class.description: sequence-specific dna binding transcription factor activity
